name: whoop-daily-sync-lambda
description: AWS Lambda function for daily WHOOP data synchronization

scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../whoop-sync-lambda.zip . && cd ..
scripts.deploy: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name whoop-daily-sync --zip-file fileb://whoop-sync-lambda.zip --region us-east-1
